channel.title: Hey people i need help (dementhium)
channel.description:
hey people, i'm currently making a spawn/eco server and i have made my shop's accept tokens but is there anyway i can change the coins picture to the fist of guthix tokens?
Heres a screenshot of what i need help with http://scr.hu/0kmz/jgys5
